summary: An ordinance approving the new assessment or re-assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3 of the former City of Ballard, now a part of the City of Seattle, for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, between a point 675 feet Southeast of the center line of 20th Avenue Northwest (formerly 2nd Avenue West) and the east line of 24th Avenue Northwest (formerly 4th Avenue West), in the former City of Ballard, now the City of Seattle, by the construction of a sub- sewer as ordered by Ordinance No. 21765 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
